name: AESOP Technology, Inc.
description: Developer of AI Enhanced SOlutions for Physicians (AESOP) designed to create decision support for physicians that improves healthcare quality and safety, and that makes billing related documentation easier using machine learning run on many patient visits. The company's technology offers decision support and reporting that flags inappropriate prescriptions, where the medications prescribed do not match the diagnosis, age, and gender of the patient, enabling users to enhance patient safety and medical billing accuracy.
one_liner: Developer of AI Enhanced SOlutions for Physicians (AESOP) designed to create decision support for physicians that improves healthcare quality and safety, and that makes billing related documentation easier using machine learning run on many patient visits. name: Ailumia Global Ltd
description: Operator and developer of an IT consulting platform. The company's platform is empowered by artificial intelligence technology to guide every aspect of their retail process, providing customers and sellers with solutions and resources for potential challenges in the e-commerce industry.

name: Ajjerni
description: Operator of a peer-to-peer rental marketplace intended to change traditional consumption behavior and revolutionize how people gain access to items and services. The company offers an online marketplace that allows users to rent items and services to and from other users in the community, enabling users to find the item or service that matches their criteria borrow items on lender contact, and agree on the rental terms.

name: Arbi, Inc.
description: Developer of predictive analytics and artificial intelligence-based platform designed to enhance decision-making by law firms. The company's software analyses international arbitration cases and uses game theory models to predict case outcomes, enabling businesses and firms to achieve desired judicial outcomes in a cost-effective manner.

The company's marketplace offers a location-based platform and mobile application that helps users to look up and schedule appointments with beauty-service providers in their cities as well as helps service providers to find their customers, enabling users to find the salon of their choice and their desired service provider within their city.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace designed to offer beauty and salon services to people. The company platform offers various vehicle parts, other equipment, and lubricants at wholesale rates and quantities from various digital vendors, enabling small-medium workshops to market their products and supplies more effectively and efficiently.

name: Carousell Pte. Ltd
description: Operator of an online platform intended to simplify the process of buying and selling. The company's marketplace offers person-to-person buying and selling of products such as fashion items, home and living, mobile, and electronics among others simply by snapping a photo and posting a description of unused and secondhand clutter easily with free listings, enabling users to enjoy discounts and discover savings as well as save time and money.

The company's platform offers creative support sessions and a variable payment scheme to creators based on results, visibility, traceability and compliance monitoring in matters of intellectual property and protection of personal data, enabling brands to publish briefs, capture, store and pay for authentic content directly from their clients and non-celebrity creators.
